articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.title: Sony is making a $2,950 screenless, battery-less full-frame camera for drones - The Verge
articles.description: Sony’s new ILX-LR1 box camera is about the size of a deck of playing cards, but this pricey specialty camera is packing a 61-megapixel full-frame sensor.
articles.content:
